description: Test cases for session chat and messaging functionality

test_cases.name: Display Chat Screen
test_cases.expected_result: Chat screen displays with header showing 'Session Chat' and session info (sport + time)

test_cases.name: Display Existing Messages
test_cases.expected_result: Existing messages displayed in chronological order

test_cases.name: Differentiate User Messages
steps: View own messages vs others' messages
test_cases.expected_result: Own messages appear on right with different styling, others' on left

test_cases.name: Send Text Message
test_cases.expected_result: Message sent and appears in chat history on right side

test_cases.name: Empty Message Prevention
test_cases.expected_result: Send button disabled or no action taken for empty message

test_cases.name: Receive Message in Real-Time
test_cases.expected_result: New message appears in chat without page refresh

test_cases.name: Scroll Through Message History
test_cases.expected_result: Older messages visible when scrolling up

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Session Detail
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Session Detail screen

test_cases.name: Long Message Handling
test_cases.expected_result: Long message wrapped properly within message bubble
